Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” and “Adult Years.” While giving audiences an interesting visual introduction to the ideological struggle between human beings through Chicago’s performance, the movie doesn’t provide very much information about Kenji’s life itself, instead focusing on his writings.
